00024 #include "uvm_barrier.h"
00025 
00026 namespace uvm {
00027 
00028 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 // Constructor: uvm_barrier
00030 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 uvm_barrier::uvm_barrier() :
00032     _n_barriers(0),
00033     _drain_time(SC_ZERO_TIME)
00034 {
00035     
00036     uvm_callback_agent * p_callback_agent;
00037 
00038     p_callback_agent = new uvm_callback_agent();
00039     _callback_map[BARRIER_RAISE] = p_callback_agent;
00040 
00041     p_callback_agent = new uvm_callback_agent();
00042     _callback_map[BARRIER_DROP] = p_callback_agent;
00043 
00044     p_callback_agent = new uvm_callback_agent();
00045     _callback_map[BARRIER_ALL_DROP] = p_callback_agent;
00046 }
00047 
00048 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // Destructor: uvm_barrier
00050 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00051 uvm_barrier::~uvm_barrier()
00052 {
00053     _callback_map.clear();
00054 }
00055 
00056 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00057 // Function: wait
00058 //  Wait until all barriers have been dropped.
00059 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00060 void uvm_barrier::wait(void)
00061 {
00062     if ( _n_barriers )
00063         ::sc_core::wait(_barrier_event);
00064     else
00065         _barrier_event.notify(SC_ZERO_TIME);
00066 }
00067 
00068 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00069 // Function: get_num_barrier
00070 //   Returns the number of barrier that are still raised.
00071 //
00072 // Returns:
00073 //  Number of barriers (int)
00074 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 int uvm_barrier::get_num_barriers(void)
00076 {
00077     return _n_barriers;
00078 }
00079 
00080 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 // Function: raise_barrier
00082 //   Raise barrier
00083 //
00084 // Parameters:
00085 //  count - number of barriers to raise (int)
00086 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 void uvm_barrier::raise_barrier(int count)
00088 {
00089      _n_barriers += count;
00090      _raise_event.notify();
00091 
00092      uvm_callback_agent *p_callback_agent;
00093      p_callback_agent = _callback_map[BARRIER_RAISE];
00094      p_callback_agent->call();
00095 }
00096 
00097 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 // Function: drop_barrier
00099 //   Drop barrier
00100 //
00101 // Parameters:
00102 //  count - number of barriers to drop (int)
00103 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00104 void uvm_barrier::drop_barrier(int count)
00105 {
00106      if (_n_barriers >= count)
00107          _n_barriers -= count;
00108      else
00109         SC_REPORT_ERROR(100, "uvm_barrier::drop_barrier - barrier count drop below zero");
00110         //SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_ERROR_ID, "uvm_barrier::drop_barrier - barrier count drop below zero");
00111          
00112      uvm_callback_agent *p_callback_agent;
00113      p_callback_agent = _callback_map[BARRIER_DROP];
00114      p_callback_agent->call();
00115 
00116      if (_n_barriers == 0)
00117      {
00118         p_callback_agent = _callback_map[BARRIER_ALL_DROP];
00119         p_callback_agent->call();
00120      }
00121 
00122      _drop_event.notify();
00123      if (!_n_barriers)
00124          wait_drain_time();
00125 }
00126 
00127 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00128 // Function: set_drain_time
00129 //   Set the Drain time for the barrier
00130 //
00131 // Parameters:
00132 //  drain_time - the amount of time to wait after all barriers have been dropped
00133 //               before notifying event (sc_time)
00134 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00135 void uvm_barrier::set_drain_time (sc_core::sc_time drain_time)
00136 {
00137     _drain_time = drain_time;
00138 }
00139 
00140 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 // Function: get_drain_time
00142 //   Returns the drain time
00143 //
00144 // Returns:
00145 //  drain_time - the amount of time to wait after all barriers have been dropped
00146 //               before notifying event (sc_time)
00147 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00148 sc_core::sc_time uvm_barrier::get_drain_time(void)
00149 {
00150     return _drain_time;
00151 }
00152 
00153 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00154 // Function: wait_drain_time
00155 //   Wait a specified amount of time before triggering all barrier has been dropped
00156 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00157 void uvm_barrier::wait_drain_time()
00158 {
00159     if (_drain_time != SC_ZERO_TIME)
00160         sc_core::wait(_drain_time, _raise_event);
00161 
00162      if (!_n_barriers)
00163          _barrier_event.notify(SC_ZERO_TIME);
00164 }
00165 
00166 
00167 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00168 // Function : get_callback_agent()
00169 //   - get a pointer to a particular callback agent
00170 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00171 uvm_callback_agent * uvm_barrier::get_callback_agent(uvm_barrier_cb_type barrier_action)
00172 {
00173   return _callback_map[barrier_action];
00174 }
